# File lib/bundler/source.rb, line 530
      def install(spec)
        Bundler.ui.info "Using #{spec.name} (#{spec.version}) from #{to_s} "

        unless @installed
          Bundler.ui.debug "  * Checking out revision: #{ref}"
          checkout if allow_git_ops?
          @installed = true
        end
        generate_bin(spec)
      end
